title: Professor G. L Peiris, from Foreign Minister to Minister of Foreign Affairs
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Gotabaya Rajapaksa in an extraordinary gazette dated the 18th of March 2022, had relinquished Professor G. L. Peiris from the office of Foreign Minister and appointed him as the Minister of Foreign Affairs.
